body: First girl (Erika. Is it just me or she looks like Kaguya during the bed scene?) acts like she’s his girlfriend and asks him to not look at other girl, while he actually just want to come in her hole. He also planned to dump the second girl (Yuzuki) for similar reason. She complained because the smoke’s smell sticks to her uniform and the boy she likes noticed; he decided she’s totally not a keeper. Their deal is sex friend until she got a boyfriend though, so he can just do her raw one last time and leave her to the new boyfriend, not needing to worry about her keep bothering him. He did abstain from smoking during sex though, because he still wants to use her. While she’s too gullible, he did try to leave good impression to approach her, even if it’s just an act.| Anyway, the nose still really breaks it. No wonder most manga style use really simple and small feature for character’s nose.
@trendbreaker yeah that one both girls are retarded
@Blankroom I think you are referring to #367268 in the last bit of your comment.  It's funny because the bull reminds me of that one asshole teacher from Yu Yu Hakusho.

minminazusa is right he apparently lost count of how many times he's done it, he only got with first girl to get with 2nd girl and plans to dump her cus she's crazy demanding. Also is fine with dumping the 2nd girl cus she got too loose. But yeah how tf does she not realize he's a bad guy when he reeks of smoke asks to be your sex friend and picks on the guy you apparently like not even mentioning he basically raped you lmao. She's kinda retarded and should get pregnant so the cuck can move on more easier. Reminds me of that other one with that retarded girl except the guy looked way stupider than this one though in that one MC could have stopped it and just watched.
@minminazusa There's not enough "Girl gets Ghosted" archs in NTRs

He’s not the type to keep the girl though. His game is, approach a girl, have sex with them, raw sex, and then done with her. No intention on keeping them as collection. Well, he doesn’t train them into his slave or anything either, so keeping a girl who act like they’re his girlfriend gets tiring (they start demanding from him). Also, the nose are terrible.
Classic yeah ... At least bastard dropped the mic very fast though, wimp can dodge.
